snippet: Osi Umenyiora, one of the Giants’ best defensive linemen, readily acknowledges his aversion to the spotlight and his reluctance to accept conventional wisdom.
abstract: New York Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora readily acknowledges his aversion to the spotlight and his reluctance to accept conventional wisdom.
lead_paragraph: Osi Umenyiora, one of the Giants’ best defensive linemen, readily acknowledges his aversion to the spotlight and his reluctance to accept conventional wisdom.

headline.seo: Giants’ Osi Umenyiora Defies Every Label
headline.main: Umenyiora Looks Beyond Next Sack, Wondering What It All Means
headline.print_headline: Umenyiora Looks Beyond Next Sack, Wondering What It All Means
